QuestData.Title: WANTED: Dreadtalon
QuestData.Description: By decree of Overlord Agmar:$B$BTarget: Dreadtalon$B$BCrime: Attacks upon the Horde$B$BStatus: Alive$B$BDreadtalon is wanted for numerous attacks upon Horde caravans traveling to and from Venomspite.$B$BDreadtalon makes his home on a bluff overlooking the Ruby Dragonshrine, east of Agmar's Hammer. He should be approached with extreme caution.$B$BAll bounties are paid out by Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Dreadtalon and return to Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight.
QuestData.CompletionText: Come to collect on a bounty?
QuestData.RewardText: About time someone put a stop to that filthy beast's killing spree! A job well done, $n.
